snippet: Brandon Weeden, a 28-year-old rookie, will start the Cleveland Browns’ exhibition game Friday against the Detroit Lions, Coach Pat Shurmur said.
lead_paragraph: Brandon Weeden, a 28-year-old rookie, will start the Cleveland Browns’ exhibition game Friday against the Detroit Lions, Coach Pat Shurmur said.

headline.main: 28-Year-Old Rookie to Start in Browns’ Exhibition Game
headline.print_headline: 28-Year-Old Rookie to Start In Browns’ Exhibition Game
